,u.pn AS seller_pn, u.shop_pn, u.shop_url, u.id, u.enable, u.salt, u.name AS seller_name, u.begin_start_date, u.contract_end_date, ua.pn AS admin_pn, ua.name AS admin_name
FROM partnership p

) uscib ON us.pn = uscib.seller_pn , users u WHERE us.pn = u.pn ) u ON u.pn = p.seller_pn LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT u.pn, u.name FROM user_admin ua, users u WHERE ua.pn = u.pn AND u.enable = TRUE ) ua ON ua.pn = p.admin_pn
